Rulings.Edison: ●If the number of Attack Position monsters becomes 2 or less due to an effect chained to this card, all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls are still destroyed when this card resolves.
Rulings.Tengu: ●If the number of face-up Attack Position monsters becomes 2 or less due to an effect chained to this card, all face-up Attack Position monsters your opponent controls are still destroyed when this card resolves.
